title: Has Ethereum fallen into the hands of a powerful ‘cartel’?
description: Is Ethereum under siege? The Ethereum ecosystem is embroiled in a controversy over the outsized impact one of its staking pools, Lido Finance (LDO), has on the network as a whole. title: Crypto struggles to climb higher as Avorak AI detects bearish long-term pattern
description: The cryptocurrency market has faced challenges in its upward momentum. Avorak AI has identified long-term bearish patterns, causing concerns among investors and traders. title: Bitcoin, XRP, and tradecurve are top coins to watch in 2023

title: Binance to Delist Monero, Dash, ZCash, and 9 Other Privacy Coins Because Governments Worldwide Cannot Track Them
description:
Soon after the European Union signed the Markets in Crypto Assets (MiCA) regulation this week, Binance decides to delist 12 privacy coins in certain jurisdictions. Binance’s decision to impose trading restrictions on privacy coins has been met with disagreement from affected entities. Crypto exchange Binance is taking action against privacy and anonymity-driven cryptocurrencies as it [...]

Der Beitrag Binance to Delist Monero, Dash, ZCash, and 9 Other Privacy Coins Because Governments Worldwide Cannot Track Them erschien zuerst auf Crypto News Flash.

title: TON Foundation proposes to burn 50% of Validator Rewards, Tradecurve spikes in value by 50%
description:
The TON Foundation proposed a burn mechanism for the network, where they suggested a 50% transaction fee burn, if implemented when a user makes a transaction a portion of the tokens will get burned and the remaining will go to the validator.  A competing project, Tradecurve, saw an increase in the value of its utility [...]

Der Beitrag TON Foundation proposes to burn 50% of Validator Rewards, Tradecurve spikes in value by 50% erschien zuerst auf Crypto News Flash.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Self-Hosted Wallets Face New AML Rules – A Guide to Wallet Usage in the EU and Important Considerations
description:
The European Banking Authority (EBA) is introducing new guidelines for unhosted crypto wallets. The new rules will call for more surveillance among crypto service providers. Crypto-related companies may have to intensify their vigilance, especially for customers who leverage privacy coins and self-hosted wallets. A number of actions are now targeted at spotting potential money laundering [...]

Der Beitrag Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Self-Hosted Wallets Face New AML Rules – A Guide to Wallet Usage in the EU and Important Considerations erschien zuerst auf Crypto News Flash.
